attributes.action: bring the insurance cheaper for young drivers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Insurance is realy expensive for young drivers aged 17- 25. The premiums are so expensive you end up paying more than what the car you own is worth. Some people can't afford to pay the insurance. we (young drivers) need cheap insurance.

please sign this petition.

kind regards M. A.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
